sourcesContent:
import './about.scss' import { SlScreenDesktop, SlRocket, SlSettings } from 'react-icons/sl' const About = () => { return( <>

about me

I am a strong middle front-end developer with five years of commercial development experience. This includes the development and support of sites both in React and pure JavaScript (more JS), I have a good taste in web design and understand the UI/UX principle. I love working on interesting projects that require logic and interesting design. Initially, my work began in a team, but later I was simply assigned to several projects in which I work alone and only occasionally involve a backend developer in order to solve backend issues. Now I am the lead developer in my projects. Now I want to develop my skills more in the direction of react development, but this technology is not needed by the company where I currently work.

my skills

development

I am skilled in UI development using HTML, CSS (SCSS), JavaScript and React, I can implement complex functionality such as animations, transitions and states.

UI/UX design

I am fond of web design, so I can make not only a functional, but also an attractive site. I also have extensive experience with web design layouts and can participate in the process of developing a site, from the stage of creating a layout to its implementation.

SEO optimization

Experience building websites with SEO priorities in mind, including optimizing titles, meta descriptions, keywords, and other metadata.

server technologies

Understanding how server technologies work, including Node.js and PHP, and being able to use them in a web development context.

) } export default About
